<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachOWriter::writeCodeSignatureData() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: This CodeSignature section behaviour must be kept in sync with that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performed in LLD&#39;s CodeSignatureSection::write /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CodeSignatureSection::writeHashes. Furthermore, this call must occur only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after the rest of the binary has already been written to the buffer. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is because the buffer is read from to perform the necessary hashing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The CodeSignature section is the last section in the MachO binary and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contains a hash of all content in the binary before it. Since llvm-objcopy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has likely modified the target binary, the hash must be regenerated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entirely. To generate this hash, we must read from the start of the binary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (HashReadStart) to just before the start of the CodeSignature section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (HashReadEnd).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CodeSignatureInfo &amp;CodeSignature = LayoutBuilder.getCodeSignature();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t &#42;BufferStart = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Buf-&gt;getBufferStart());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t &#42;HashReadStart = BufferStart;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t &#42;HashReadEnd = BufferStart + CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a501dae31ffe5fe07a5b64d779f067c33">StartOffset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The CodeSignature section begins with a header, after which the hashes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of each page of the binary are written.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t &#42;HashWriteStart = HashReadEnd + CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#aba0e101947a011beae3dc845410d08cb">AllHeadersSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t TextSegmentFileOff = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t TextSegmentFileSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (O.TextSegmentCommandIndex) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoadCommand &amp;TextSegmentLoadCommand =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">        O.LoadCommands&#91;&#42;O.TextSegmentCommandIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TextSegmentLoadCommand.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#a521ae30565359d9c67ad94fed18ce660">MachOLoadCommand</a>.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">               MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;APPLE&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is macOS-specific work-around and makes no sense for any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other host OS. See https://openradar.appspot.com/FB8914231</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The macOS kernel maintains a signature-verification cache to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// quickly validate applications at time of execve(2).  The trouble</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is that for the kernel creates the cache entry at the time of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mmap(2) call, before we have a chance to write either the code to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sign or the signature header+hashes.  The fix is to invalidate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all cached data associated with the output file, thus discarding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the bogus prematurely-cached signature.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">  msync(BufferStart, CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a501dae31ffe5fe07a5b64d779f067c33">StartOffset</a> + CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a563a66a1ed642fbf208daf432e7aeabe">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MS&#95;INVALIDATE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
